bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Alternative Names wei jue 痿厥 , dysfunction with recession . Pathological Condition of atrophy and weakness of the lower legs with an inability to stand or walk, in severe cases with a shrinkage of muscle tissue and a sensation of ice cold when touched (hence the notion of warm, yang qi having receded from the region). Shen nong ben cao jing 神農本草經 Substance Entry zi wan 紫菀：去蠱毒，痿蹶，安五藏 , “It removes gu poison, [cures] dys function with loss of mobility , and it pacifies the five depots”.
